synopsis.text: Nagisa is a 26-year-old office worker who is shy and still a virgin. Wanting to change this, she decides to go on a spontaneous trip where she has a fateful meeting with Sazanami, a man with yakuza ties evident from his tattoos. Though very different, Nagisa spends the night with Sazanami, touched by his gentlemanly passion. As their relationship unfolds, Nagisa finds herself captivated by his devoted affection, which melts her hesitations. Sazanami treasures Nagisa, even promising her the stars as they share intimate moments. Though aware of the risks, Nagisa opens her heart to the possibilities of this unlikely romance. Will the passion between them spark a dramatic love that overcomes their vastly different worlds? Can an innocent office lady and a gangster defy conventions to achieve an enduring happiness together?
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
